* [Arkemyr's Manor](/arkemyrsManor/): Bedroom - In the locked armoire.
* [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/): Sold by [Kipeha](/kipeha/).
* [Sea-Lashed Crypt](/seaLashedCrypt/): Crypt interior, past the bridge.
* [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/): Found growing along the river leading up to the [Temple of Gaun](/templeOfGaun/).
* Can be looted from dead [Jungle lurker](/jungleLurker/).
